73 TEST_FILE("ltc_6806.c")
74 
75 /*========== Definitions and Implementations for Unit Test ==================*/
76 /* SPI data configuration struct for LTC communication */
77 static const spiDAT1_t spi_kLtcDataConfig = {
78  /* struct is implemented in the TI HAL and uses uppercase true and false */
79  .CS_HOLD = FALSE, /* The HW chip select signal is deactivated */
80  .WDEL = TRUE, /* No delay will be inserted */
81  .DFSEL = SPI_FMT_0, /* Data word format select */
82  .CSNR = 0x0, /* Chip select (CS) number, 0x01h for CS[0] */
83 };
84 
85 /* SPI interface configuration for LTC communication */
86 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_ltcInterface[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
87  {
88  .pConfig = &spi_kLtcDataConfig,
89  .pNode = spiREG1,
90  .pGioPort = &(spiREG1->PC3),
91  .csPin = 2u,
92  },
93 };
94 
95 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_ltcInterfaceSecondary[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
96  {
97  .pConfig = &spi_kLtcDataConfig,
98  .pNode = spiREG1,
99  .pGioPort = &(spiREG1->PC3),
100  .csPin = 2u,
101  },
102 };
103

106 }

109 }

111 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
112 void testCommandArrays(void) {
113  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdWRCFG);
114  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCFG);
115  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVA_Fuelcell);
116  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVB_Fuelcell);
117  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVC_Fuelcell);
118  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVD_Fuelcell);
119  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVE_Fuelcell);
120  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVF_Fuelcell);
121  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVG_Fuelcell);
122  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVH_Fuelcell);
123  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdRDCVI_Fuelcell);
124  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_cmdADCV_normal_Fuelcell);
125  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_BC_cmdADOW_PUP_100ms_fuelcell);
126  TEST_ASSERT_PEC_CORRECT_IN_ARRAY(ltc_BC_cmdADOW_PDOWN_100ms_fuelcell);
127 }
